Upon a successful accuracy skill check against the targetâ€™s mitigation, the target is pulled 15 feet towards the player.

Combat Training: Flailing Strike
effect: The player learns to use the <i>Flailing Strike<i> ability for the flail. When making a flail attack versus an opponent with a shield, BC from the shield is reduced by half.

name: Combat Training: Polearm Reverse Strike
effect: The player learns to ride a saddle and control a horse via bridle. The player can now attempt mounted attacks from horseback,

name: Combat Training: Estoc Piercing Strike
effect: The player learns the proper use of the estoc, a martial thrusting sword. When attacking with the estoc, opponents wearing chain mail gain half BC from their armor.
reqs: At least one estoc sword in inventory

name: Combat Training: Mordhau
reqs: At least one sword in inventory with the mordhau property.

name: Combat Training: Keshik
effect: The player learns to manipulate and aim a bow and arrow from horseback. Range attacks from horseback no longer have disadvantage.

name: Combat Training: Lancer
effect: The player trains to fight and use polearms while saddled on horseback. The player no longer has disadvantage
